attributes.action: Stop placing important government contracts with overseas organisations
attributes.additional_details:
It is time that the Government supported the remaining industries that we have in the UK by ensuring that where feasibly (i.e not in conflict with International Competition Law) possible, we focus our spending on military and major asset procurement towards UK based, UK registered and more importantly UK owned businesses.
We are seeing a rapid increase in the degeneration of skills in within Engineering and Technology which could be underpinned by sensible government spending.
